title: Dave Is Back From PCA 2022 with New Cigars, Rumors & More!
itunes:title: Dave Is Back From PCA 2022 with New Cigars, Rumors & More!
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority broadcasting live from the Toscano Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire… Ed Sullivan and David Garofalo are back from PCA 2022 and they have a lot to talk about! It was Ed’s first time there and he will let us know if it was everything he thought it was!

In the first hour Dave throws down 4 cigars that he did not buy yet from the show. We choose a cigar and weigh in if he made the right decision or not! In the second hour we light up something that he brought in for the first time and we let him know if he made the right decision!

Join us for all of this and the usual suspects including the VS Question of the Week, Offer of the Day, Ask the Don, the Email of the Week and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

As always you can find many of the cigars we smoke at https://www.2guyscigars.com.
